ModMetaData.name: VV - New Harvest: Compatibility Patches
ModMetaData.author: octodecoy
ModMetaData.description:
VV - New Harvest: Compatibility Patches provides integration for the base game, DLCs, and other mods, ensuring that content from the main [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3448458106]VV - New Harvest[/url] mod (or its standalone modules) works seamlessly together.
Also adds a settings menu with extra options pertaining to New Harvest stuff.
Requires one of the following:
[url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3448458106]VV - New Harvest[/url] [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3552456491]VV - New Harvest: Forage Crops[/url] [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3552455580]VV - New Harvest: Garden Crops[/url] [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3552456765]VV - New Harvest: Industrial Crops[/url] [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3552456140]VV - New Harvest: Medicinal Plants[/url] [url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3552455805]VV - New Harvest: Trees[/url]
